Class MouseManager

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
MouseManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
public class MouseManager
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
This class is used to listen mouse inputs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int click
    The click number It is used to store the last click.

    This variable represents the exit button for game over state.

    the row value of the previous moving tile
    private int prev_j
    the column value of the previous moving tile
    boolean restart
    This variable represents the start new game button.
    boolean resume
    This variable represents the resume button.
    boolean[][] tiles
    This array contains the tiles of the game.

  • Field Details

    • tiles

      public boolean[][] tiles
      This array contains the tiles of the game. The pressed tile becomes true. The released tile becomes false.

    • exit

      public boolean exit
      This variable represents the exit button for game over state. Its value becomes true, when exit button is pressed. Its value becomes false, when exit button is released.

    • restart

      public boolean restart
      This variable represents the start new game button. Its value becomes true, when start new game button is pressed. Its value becomes false, when start new game button is released.

    • pause

      public boolean pause
      This variable represents the pause button. Its value becomes true, when pause button is pressed. Its value becomes false, when pause button is released.

    • resume

      public boolean resume
      This variable represents the resume button. Its value becomes true, when resume button is pressed. Its value becomes false, when resume button is released.

    • click

      private int click
      The click number It is used to store the last click. Thus, the tiles can be swapped with each other easily.

    • prev_i

      private int prev_i
      the row value of the previous moving tile

    • prev_j

      private int prev_j
      the column value of the previous moving tile

      public MouseManager()
      MouseManager Constructor

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method resets the remaining information for the new game state.

    • mousePressed

      public void mousePressed​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a component.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      e - the event to be processed

    • findPressedTile

      private void findPressedTile​(int j, int my)
      This method finds the pressed tile.
      Parameters:
      j - the j value indicates which column the pressed tile is in.
      my - the y-coordinate of the mouse

    • getPrev_i

      public int getPrev_i()
      Gets the row value of the previous moving tile.
      Returns:
      the row value of the previous moving tile

    • setPrev_i

      public void setPrev_i​(int prev_i)
      Sets the row value of the previous moving tile.
      Parameters:
      prev_i - the new row value of the previous moving tile

    • getPrev_j

      public int getPrev_j()
      Gets the column value of the previous moving tile.
      Returns:
      the column value of the previous moving tile

    • setPrev_j

      public void setPrev_j​(int prev_j)
      Sets the column value of the previous moving tile.
      Parameters:
      prev_j - the new column value of the previous moving tile
